title: The Fifth Estate
creator_credit: Shay Cunliffe, Mark Tildesley, Participant, Reliance Entertainment, Touchstone Pictures, Anonymous Content, DreamWorks Pictures, Steve Golin, Bill Condon, Michael Sugar and Josh Singer
headline_credit: Belgium, India and United States of America, 2013
brief_description: A look at the relationship between WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange and his early supporter and eventual colleague Daniel Domscheit-Berg, and how the website’s growth and influence led to an irreparable rift between the two friends.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.
